example.text: Democrats and Republicans agree—our immigration system is broken. But rather than work on a bipartisan solution, [[user]]'s extreme bill does nothing to secure our border and would derail the economy while throwing families legally seeking asylum in jail. [[url]]

I had a great meeting with [[user]] leaders to discuss local issues, federal funding opportunities, & ways that we can work together to best serve our constituents. I’m grateful for the productive conversation & am proud to represent such a special community in Congress. [[url]]

Happy #InfrastructureWeek, Virginia! Thanks to our Bipartisan Infrastructure Law, $3 billion is already on its way to repair and rebuild our commonwealth's roads, bridges, and highways. Check out a ? of how this once-in-a-generation investment is transforming our district:

Happy #PublicServiceRecognitionWeek to #VA10’s outstanding public servants for all they do to keep our community and our country running. I'm a proud champion for our civil servants in Congress, fighting for the pay, benefits, and respect they deserve. [[url]]

At today's [[user]] hearing, we heard harrowing stories about the abuse and harassment of those speaking out for human rights in Hong Kong. The deterioration of the rule of law is dangerous and alarming. Protestors, journalists, and political prisoners must be kept safe. [[url]]

If [[user]] wants to go public on the US market, they need to prove to American consumers that their clothes aren't made with forced labor. I've led a bipartisan effort to require an independent verification of Shein's labor practices. [[url]]
